vv63:3.3: Migaṁ tañceva → migaṁ gantveva (sya1ed, sya2ed); migavadhañca (mr)
vv63:6.4: Mantvā → mantā (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1-2, mr) | bhāsasi → bhāsase (bj)
vv63:13.4: tepi no → na tepi (bj); tepi na (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1-2)
vv63:14.1: andhakaveṇḍuputtā → andhakaveṇhuputtā (bj, pts-vp-pli1-2); andhakaveṇḍaputtā (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr)
vv63:27.3: Tathāpakāro → tathappakāro (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1-2) | tavāyaṁ → tavayaṁ (bj, pts-vp-pli1-2)
vv63:34.1: Nandane ca vane → nandanopavane (bj, pts-vp-pli2); nandane pavare (sya1ed, sya2ed); nandane pavane (pts-vp-pli1, mr)
